column6: 'Twas the night before Christmas, and all through Manhattan, not a creature was stirring 'cause Blade had all stabbed 'em!  There's one vampire Blade's been dying to get his sword on:  Santa Claus!  And this is the year he's vowed to do it.
column8: | penciller:Howard Chaykin | colorist:Edgar Delgado | penciller (cover):Marko Djurdjevic | writer:Marc Guggenheim | letterer:Rus Wooton
